sys_documentation.help: Please provide information on the scope of the Project vis-à-vis the PIA:
sys_documentation.hint: Please provide information on the scope of the Project vis-à-vis the PIA: (1) Connected Processing Activities – the processes connected to the Project, or processes that the Project may be a part of (2) In-Scope – the processes that will be documented in the PIA for assessment (3) Out-of-Scope – the processes that may be connected to the Project, but are not for assessment under the PIA
sys_documentation.label: Project Type
sys_documentation.name: x_935283_pia_project
